name: Plus.im Dark Theme 0.6
description: A nice dark plus.im theme, starting with the base code of Plus.im Anti-White 0.0.7 - now with no ads!
additional_info: Starting with the quick and dirty Plus.im Anti-White 0.0.7 (http://userstyles.org/styles/88466), I've themed just about everything, except the rollover popups (fun fact, the css calls the q-tips.)  I've just removed the new ads - more updates forthcoming.  I am happy to take requests and include edits you make in discussion - but please keep in mind I am a novice.  I haven't tested this script in Firefox but as far as I know it should work.
